alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cook, southeastern Irwin, northern Berrien, eastern Colquitt and southeastern Tift Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moultrie, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Sparks, Enigma, Norman Park, Lenox, Alapaha, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Cool Spring, Eldorado, Staunton, Pineboro, Gladys, Barneyville, Glory, Flat Ford, Wagon Wheel, Fender, Laconte and Brookfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
